## Status Quo

```{r}
library(tidyverse)


Adder <- ggproto("Adder",
  x = 0,
  add = function(self, n) {
    self$x <- self$x + n
    self$x
  }
 )

is.ggproto(Adder)
#> [1] TRUE

Adder$add(10)
#> [1] 10
Adder$add(10)
#> [1] 20

Doubler <- ggproto("Doubler", Adder,
  add = function(self, n) {
    ggproto_parent(Adder, self)$add(n * 2)
  }
)

Doubler$x
#> [1] 20
Doubler$add(10)
#> [1] 40

```
